work-item.field:
Import Process:
  1. Start import of existing Microsoft Word document - document is parsed by Polarion
  2. Configure what paragraphs should be marked as requirements or other entities. Recognition rules are based on keywords, styles and/or regular expressions. Recognition rules can be saved for later reuse
  3. Finish import of the Word document - document is imported, converted and items are created


The imported documents preserve all content:

  • Document structure including headings
  • Free form rich text content, chapters like: Introduction, Appendices, Indexâ€¦
  • Tables and Images
  • Requirements and/or other entities
